pkgmetadata.longdescription: Estimates Reliability of Individual Supervised Learning Predictions // An implementation of reliability estimation methods described in the paper (Bosnic, Z., Kononenko, I. (2008) doi:10.1007/s10489-007-0084-9), which allows you to test the reliability of a single predicted instance made by your model and prediction function. It also allows you to make a correlation test to estimate which reliability estimate is the most accurate for your model.
